name: Perform Flux Balance Analysis
description: Perform Flux Balance Analysis (FBA) on a genome-scale metabolic network model to predict metabolic flux distributions
install: cd /tmp && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni.git biomni_repo && cd biomni_repo && pip install -e . && pip install cobra pandas

inputs.name: MODEL_FILE
inputs.description: Path to the metabolic model file (SBML or JSON format)

inputs.name: CONSTRAINTS
inputs.description: JSON dictionary of reaction constraints (format: {"reaction_id": [lower_bound, upper_bound]})

inputs.name: OBJECTIVE_REACTION
inputs.description: Reaction ID to use as the objective function (e.g., biomass reaction)

inputs.name: OUTPUT_FILE
inputs.description: File name to save the flux distribution results
